titles.title: Paying tribute to Shirley Horn in recognition of her many achievements and contributions to the world of jazz and American culture.
Paying tribute to Shirley Horn in recognition of her many achievements and contributions to the world of jazz and American culture.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.
Mr. Porter moved to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution, as amended.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H. Con. Res. 300.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution, as amended Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Pays tribute to the late Shirley Horn.
Recognizes her many achievements and contributions to the world of jazz and American culture.
